excerpt.rendered: The Research Project Management Group provides the structure and oversight needed to guide projects from concept to completion. They coordinate timelines, budgets, resources, and communications to ensure that goals are met efficiently and deliverables meet high standards. This team works closely with researchers, technical staff, and external partners to define objectives, identify risks, and track progress, offering tools and strategies that keep complex initiatives on schedule and within scope. By balancing big-picture planning with day-to-day details, the Project Management Group enables smooth and successful execution of RENCI projects.

yoast_head_json.title: Research Project Management - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: The Research Project Management Group provides the structure and oversight needed to guide projects from concept to completion. They coordinate timelines, budgets, resources, and communications to ensure that goals are met efficiently and deliverables meet high standards. This team works closely with researchers, technical staff, and external partners to define objectives, identify risks, and track progress, offering tools and strategies that keep complex initiatives on schedule and within scope. By balancing big-picture planning with day-to-day details, the Project Management Group enables smooth and successful execution of RENCI projects.

@graph.caption: Project management business technology concept on vr screen.

excerpt.rendered:
The Research Operations Group provides the essential backbone that keeps RENCI running smoothly and efficiently. They handle the day-to-day operations that allow staff and leadership to focus on their core work—managing schedules, coordinating meetings and events, maintaining records, and ensuring compliance with policies and procedures. They often serve as the first point of contact for internal and external inquiries, facilitate communication across RENCI groups, and support hiring, onboarding, and other personnel needs.

In particular, the Research Ops Group is the point of contact for availability and questions related to the RENCI Office of the Director (OOD).

yoast_head_json.title: Research Operations - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: The Research Operations Group provides the essential backbone that keeps RENCI running smoothly and efficiently. They handle the day-to-day operations that allow staff and leadership to focus on their core work—managing schedules, coordinating meetings and events, maintaining records, and ensuring compliance with policies and procedures. They often serve as the first point of contact for internal and external inquiries, facilitate communication across RENCI groups, and support hiring, onboarding, and other personnel needs.  In particular, the Research Ops Group is the point of contact for availability and questions related to the RENCI Office of the Director (OOD).

excerpt.rendered: The RENCI Office of the Director (OOD) serves as the central hub for leadership and coordination across the organization. It supports the director in setting strategic priorities, making key decisions, and ensuring that all programs and initiatives align with the organization’s mission and goals. OOD oversees high-level planning, policy development, and external relations, while also managing internal communications.

yoast_head_json.title: Office of the Director - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: The RENCI Office of the Director (OOD) serves as the central hub for leadership and coordination across the organization. It supports the director in setting strategic priorities, making key decisions, and ensuring that all programs and initiatives align with the organization’s mission and goals. OOD oversees high-level planning, policy development, and external relations, while also managing internal communications.

@graph.caption: Concept of project management with icons on wooden cubes

excerpt.rendered: The RENCI Management Team is comprised of staff who oversee other staff. The team comes together to discuss key strategies and ensure that RENCI operates effectively. They work to translate RENCI’s mission and vision into actionable plans; provide guidance and support to staff; foster collaboration across units; and monitor progress to keep initiatives on track.

yoast_head_json.title: Management Team - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: The RENCI Management Team is comprised of staff who oversee other staff. The team comes together to discuss key strategies and ensure that RENCI operates effectively. They work to translate RENCI’s mission and vision into actionable plans; provide guidance and support to staff; foster collaboration across units; and monitor progress to keep initiatives on track.

@graph.caption: Business team collaboration discussing working analyzing with financial data and marketing growth report graph in team, presentation and brainstorming to strategy planning making profit of company.

excerpt.rendered:
The Communications and Outreach Group focuses on four core areas that serve both the institute as a whole and the unique identities of many funded, stand-alone projects:
1) Communications and branding – developing and executing strategies for communications, marketing, and brand identity.
2) Web development and design – creating and, when needed, maintaining general websites and scientific web applications with an emphasis on intuitive user interfaces and engaging user experiences.
3) User engagement – designing and implementing strategies to connect scientific communities with products developed by RENCI and its partners.
4) Public engagement with data science – fostering opportunities for broad communities to understand and interact with data science research and its societal impacts.

yoast_head_json.title: Communications and Outreach - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: The Communications and Outreach Group focuses on four core areas that serve both the institute as a whole and the unique identities of many funded, stand-alone projects: 1) Communications and branding – developing and executing strategies for communications, marketing, and brand identity. 2) Web development and design – creating and, when needed, maintaining general websites and scientific web applications with an emphasis on intuitive user interfaces and engaging user experiences. 3) User engagement – designing and implementing strategies to connect scientific communities with products developed by RENCI and its partners. 4) Public engagement with data science – fostering opportunities for broad communities to understand and interact with data science research and its societal impacts.

excerpt.rendered: The Advanced Cyberinfrastructure Support (ACIS) Team provides a wide range of IT services and support across all groups at RENCI, and is responsible for managing infrastructure in the cloud and on premise in the RENCI datacenter. The team oversees services ranging from high performance computing, enterprise storage, and virtualization to desktop and audio/video conference room support.

yoast_head_json.title: Advanced Cyberinfrastructure Support - RENCI
yoast_head_json.og_description: The Advanced Cyberinfrastructure Support (ACIS) Team provides a wide range of IT services and support across all groups at RENCI, and is responsible for managing infrastructure in the cloud and on premise in the RENCI datacenter. The team oversees services ranging from high performance computing, enterprise storage, and virtualization to desktop and audio/video conference room support.
